# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  **Phone:** 347-491-2955  |  **Location:** New York, NY  
**[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)**  |  **[GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)**

---

## Professional Summary
Solutions-focused software engineer with over 6 years of experience in developing scalable applications and optimizing performance across various platforms. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions that enhance user experiences and drive engagement. Adept in multiple programming languages including Python, Java, and SQL, with a strong foundation in cloud technologies such as AWS and Azure. Eager to leverage technical expertise and collaborative skills to contribute to Meta's mission of connecting billions of people globally.

---

**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
City University of New York – NYC College of Technology  
*Jun 2024*  |  GPA: 3.78  |  Dean’s List (5x)  |  National Honor Society  

---

## Core Skills
- **Programming Languages:** Python, Java, SQL, JavaScript, C++, Swift, Kotlin  
- **Cloud Technologies:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure (App Service, Functions)  
- **Software Development:** Agile/Scrum methodologies, SDLC, Microservices Architecture  
- **Data Management:** ETL/ELT, Data Modeling, APIs (REST, FastAPI)  
- **Security:** SIEM, IDS, Active Directory, Cybersecurity best practices  
- **Tools & Technologies:** Docker, Git, CI/CD, PostgreSQL, MongoDB  

---
